lead_paragraph: For his Round-of-16 date with Villanova, Duke’s Gerald Henderson will head to the city where his father’s legendary steal helped save the most important series of the Bird era.
snippet: For his Round-of-16 date with Villanova, Duke’s Gerald Henderson will head to the city where his father’s legendary steal helped save the most important series of the Bird era.
